newsitem.title: USA: BEFORE THE BELL-Informix up on new software.
newsitem.headline: BEFORE THE BELL-Informix up on new software.

text.p: Investors responded positively to news about the prospects for Informix Corp's Universal Server, a new database management software to be released this week that holds a competitive edge over Oracle Corp.
Preceding the market open Monday, Informix shares traded at 24-7/16, up from 23-3/4, while Oracle traded as low as 48-1/2, off 1/2, but then rose to 49-1/16.

Among the reports, the New York Times reported Informix's server is a new type of database software that can process multiple types of data. A comparable product is not expected from Oracle until some time next year, the Times said.
